mapper.select: SELECT fa.id,fa_name,fa_method,,xw.xw_fa_id xw_fa_id,SUM(CASE WHEN xw.xw_fa_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) xw_num,fa_zxw_name,fa_xwc,fa_zqcd FROM ts_fa fa LEFT JOIN ts_xw xw ON fa.id=xw.xw_fa_id WHERE fa_name LIKE #{search} GROUP BY fa.id

SELECT fa.id,fa_name,fa_method,xw.xw_fa_id xw_fa_id,SUM(CASE WHEN xw.xw_fa_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) xw_num,fa_zxw_name,fa_xwc,fa_zqcd FROM ts_fa fa LEFT JOIN ts_xw xw ON fa.id=xw.xw_fa_id GROUP BY xw.xw_fa_id
SELECT fa.id,fa_name,COUNT(*) xw_num FROM ts_fa fa LEFT JOIN ts_xw xw ON fa.id = xw.xw_fa_id GROUP BY xw.xw_fa_id ORDER BY fa.fa_create
mapper.insert: insert into ts_fa (fa_name, fa_method, fa_zxw, fa_create, fa_modified, fa_xwc, fa_zqcd) values (#{faName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faZxw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{faModified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{faXwc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faZqcd,jdbcType=INTEGER})
